thread.section_title: Stock Market & Finance News - Wall Street Journal
thread.title: A Client Educated on Investing Is a Better Client

author: wsjcom
title: A Client Educated on Investing Is a Better Client
text:
Sheree Arntson • Chief executive, senior investment adviser at Allium Financial Advisors in Portland, Ore. • Education: B.S. in public health, University of Oregon • Professional designations: Certified Trust and Financial Advisor
Background: For Sheree Arntson, education has been a touchstone of her career in wealth management. After college, Ms. Arntson worked with a group of physicians managing the employee benefits for their practices. There she became interested in retirement-plan structure and administration. After...
